subject: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF NEW YO
body:
FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF NEW YORK
ADDRESS: 33 LIBERTY STREET,
NEW YORK, N.Y 10038.
ATTN: FUND BENEFICIARY,
Re: ATM Card payment notification.
This is to officially inform you that the bank Federal Reserve Board New York Branch has concluded in the meeting today over your long overdue contract payment and agreed that your payment worth US$14.500,000.00 will be released to you through ATM Master Card which will be delivered to you directly to your home address.
However, you are further advised to know that all arrangement has been completed long ago for the immediate dispatch to your residency, you have to reply back to us as soon as possible with the below DATAâ€™ to enable the Ups shipping department proceed with the immediate dispatch tomorrow been Saturday dated 24th of February 2024 on your behalf.
Finally, this is very urgent and important the bank are waiting to hear from you right away today, 
Bear in mind that the tracking number of your parcel will be given to you immediately the Processing charge and Stamp fee which will not cost you much is received to avoid any immediate STOP ORDER from the United Nation office.
Note That Because Of Impostors, We Hereby Issued You Our Code Of Conduct, Which Is (ATM-2024) So You Have To Indicate This Code When replying back to us By Using It As Your Subject. 
Get back to us with this information needed,
Full Names:
Your Address:
Country:
Direct Number:
Your Age And Occupation:
A scan copy of your ID card or passport
:
Reply back to us accordingly; The bank Wait For Your Expedite Response.
Yours in Service,
Mr. Jerome H. Powell
Chairman Federal Reserve Board New York

subject: Re: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF NEW YO
body:
Hello Mr. Jerome H. Powell,

Thank you for reaching out to me and informing me about this exciting news! I'm thrilled to hear that the Federal Reserve Board New York Branch has concluded a meeting regarding my overdue contract payment.

I am eager to receive the ATM Master Card, but I have a few questions before we proceed further. Could you please explain why there is a processing charge and stamp fee? Also, could you provide more details about the "STOP ORDER" from the United Nations office?

I noticed that you asked for a scanned copy of my ID card or passport. Unfortunately, I can't provide these documents due to personal security reasons. Is there any other way we can verify my identity?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Andrew

subject: Re: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF NEW YO
body:
Please I'm so sorry for late reply I was very busy in my office since
morning .so I got your email and I do understand you are trying to say but
I'm here to tell you that we don't have anything like stamp fee or
something like that.the only fee on it is  the transferring charge and
nothing else.so I will advise you to go straight to the point and me how
you want to receive your funds so that we can proceed on it without wasting
much time

Thank you
Regards .mr Jerome H powell

subject: Re: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF NEW YO
body:
Hello Jerome Powell,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your patience and understanding. I'm just a simple person, so please bear with me if I ask too many questions.

You mentioned about a charge, could you kindly elaborate on that? What is this charge for and how much would it be? Also, how will this affect the process of receiving my funds?

I'm really excited to receive these funds but I want to make sure everything is clear before we proceed. Thank you again for your time.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Andrew

subject: Re: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF NEW YO
body:
Thank you very much for your question.mr Andrew you are free to ask
whatever you want to ask I have no problem with that. and I will explain
everything in details for you to understand. the charge is for the
transferring of your funds . and we are going to get some needed documents
obtain to make sure that the transaction went successful . and all the
documentation and payment slip will be forwarded to you as soon as you
remit payment . and please make sure that this is your private email . for

Thank you.
Regards mr Jerome H powell

subject: Re: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF NEW YO
body:
As matter of fact everyone has inside of him/her a piece of good news. The
good news is that you don't know how great you can be! How much you can
achieve! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is,all you need
is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your
destination.because you make a choice, continue living your life feeling
muddled in this abyss of self-misunderstanding, or you find your identity
independent of it as you draw your own box.Believe you can and you're
halfway there,just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do
because where there is hope, determination, faith and inspiration, I don't
think you can go wrong rather than ambitionsly achieve beyond people's
imagination.
I believe you must have realized that your destiny can only be delays but
can never be deny likewise this fund payment which you must surely receive
as the Federal Government are well determined and keen to pay your overdue
long awaited inheritance Fund payment prize which I'm very much sure that
your there almost to celebrate with your fund payment this very time, but
only if you can be convinced enough to negotiate with the right agency
Official assigned for the funds payment.
Thanks and stay safe.
